Detailed Description

This is a sub-structure in CSL_Aif2CommonSetup. This structure is used for configuring the parameters of Egress data buffer.

Field Documentation

Bool CSL_Aif2EgrDbSetup::bEnableChannel[128]

Boolean indicating if the channel is to be enabled

Bool CSL_Aif2EgrDbSetup::bEnableEgrDb

Boolean indicating if Ingress data buffer is to be enabled

CSL_Aif2DioLen CSL_Aif2EgrDbSetup::DioBufferLen

DIO buffer length selection between 128 and 256 bytes

CSL_Aif2DbChannel CSL_Aif2EgrDbSetup::EgrDbChannel[128]

Channel configuration structure for all 128 channels

CSL_Aif2DbPmControl CSL_Aif2EgrDbSetup::PmControl

Egress Packet mode control
